title: SKCamera helper class
body: I've seen that the original SKIA library has a helper class for the projection transformation matrix called "SkCamera". Please implement this in SkiaSharp too: https://skia.org/user/api/skmatrix

comments.author: KingSora
comments.body:
If I'm trying to initialize a new  SK3dView, I get a "System.EntryPointNotFoundException".

The line of code looks like this:

```
SK3dView v = new SK3dView();
```

I've updated SkiaShap as follows:
1. git submodule init && git submodule update
2. git pull

Then I ran the script:
".\bootstrapper.ps1 -Target externals"
".\bootstrapper.ps1 -Target libs"

Did I miss something or did I something wrong?

Best regards,
Sora

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
@KingSora you need to clean first. Probably the old native outputs are being used.

```
.\bootstrapper.ps1 -Target clean
```

The build script checks the `native-builds/lib` directory for compiled outputs.
